definition: A trading engine reference determines which trading engine the trading bot shall use to structure the data it processes while running the trading session.

paragraphs.text: In other words, the trading engine reference lets the process instance know which data structure to use to store information related to the trading session. This means that a workspace may have more than one trading engine.
To add a trading engine reference, select Add Missing Children on the trading session node menu.
After adding a trading engine reference node, make sure you establish the reference to the corresponding trading engine hierarchy.
